text: The 2010 Valencia Superbike World Championship round was the third round of the 2010 Superbike World Championship season. It took place on the weekend of April 9–11, 2010 at Circuit Ricardo Tormo in Valencia, Spain. ==Results== ===Superbike race 1 classification=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" ! Pos ! The race was restarted for the remaining 20 laps and the final result was the aggregate of the times of the two heats. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" ! Pos ! No ! Rider ! Manufacturer !
